Flub.Name: Gaussian
Flub.Description: Creates mostly high noise with fewer dips.

Flub.Name: Poisson
Flub.Description: Similar to Guassian but with deeper dips.

Flub.Name: Impulse
Flub.Description: Almost flat with few sharp dips.

Flub.Name: Uniform
Flub.Description: Very flat with lots of low dips.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
